name: docstring-verifier
description: Detect discrepancies between docstrings and code

docstringVerifier.pythonPath.description: Path to Python interpreter (leave empty for auto-detection)

docstringVerifier.pythonScriptPath.description: Custom path to ast_extractor.py (for development only)

docstringVerifier.preferUv.description: Prefer uv for running Python scripts (faster, more reliable)

docstringVerifier.docstringStyle.description: Docstring style to use for validation and generation (auto = detect automatically)

docstringVerifier.useLLM.description: Use LLM (GitHub Copilot) to generate descriptions for Quick Fixes. If disabled, 'TODO' placeholders will be used instead.

docstringVerifier.llmTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for LLM requests (1000-30000). If the LLM doesn't respond in time, a 'TODO' placeholder will be used.

docstringVerifier.llmProvider.description: LLM provider to use for generating descriptions. Currently only GitHub Copilot is supported.

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
scripts.lint:python: cd tools/python && (uv run ruff check . || ruff check .)
scripts.format:python: cd tools/python && (uv run ruff format . || ruff format .)
scripts.test:python: cd tools/python && uv run python -m pytest
